SEARCH
Package PamguardMVC

Class SaveRequirements

java.lang.Object
PamguardMVC.SaveRequirements
public class SaveRequirements extends Object
Class which can tell a data store what type of work is needed to re-save the data.
Author:
Doug Gillespie
